text: User Privacy Policy (detailed version)

"China Telecom Business Hall APP" (referred to as "this APP") was owned and operated by China Telecom Co., Ltd. (referred to as "we"). Our registered address is: No. 99, Xingshikou Road, Haidian District, BeijingBuilding.
label: Contact Information

text: In the process of registering and using this APP, we may collect and use your relevant information.

This "User Privacy Policy" (referred to as "this privacy policy" or "this policy") aims to explain the rules of this app to handle your personal information, including but not limited to your personal information, collect, store and use youPersonal information and methods, and how you exercise your privacy rights.
Please carefully read and fully understand all the contents of this policy before using this APP, especially the content that is significantly identified by the font boldness.
If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us.

If you use or continue to use our products or services after we update our privacy policy, it means that you agree with the content of the privacy policy (including the updated version) and agree that we will process your relevant information in accordance with this privacy policy.
label: Policy Change
Important
Risk
rewrite: If you use or continue to use our products or services after we update our privacy policy, it means that you agree to be subject to this privacy policy.

text: If you do not agree with this privacy policy or any provisions, you can choose to stop registering or stop using or cancel this APP. At the same time, this APP will no longer provide you with relevant services.
Our related companies mentioned in this privacy policy include China Telecom Group Co., Ltd. and its branches, holding subsidiaries and their branches.
This privacy policy includes the following:
1. Use the rules of user information collection and use in various business functions;
2. How do we use cookies and similar technologies;
3. How do we share, transfer, and publicly disclose your personal information;
4. How do we protect your personal information;
5. How can we save your personal information;
6. Protection of Minor Information;
Seven, your rights;
8. How to update this policy;
Nine, how to contact us.
1. User information collection and use rules in various business functions

Personal information refers to the various information related to the recognized or recognizable natural person recorded in electronics or other methods, excluding information after anonymous processing.

Sensitive personal information refers to personal information that can easily cause the personality and dignity of natural persons to be infringed or harmed by personal and property security, including biometrics, religious beliefs, specific identities, medical health, financial accounts, trajectory trajectory and other informationAnd personal information under minor at the age of 14.
When we deal with your sensitive personal information, we will solicit your authorization by pop -up window.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: When we deal with your sensitive personal information, we will solicit your authorization by pop -up window.
